entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:54 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
